page.title: 09Music Wantage Silver Band
page.content: A conductor and trainer of the Wantage Silver Band, who lives in Grove, came to school to talk about the Band, started 12 years ago by Doug Brand. He tried to find enough adults to play, but soon found it would be better to train children. Now parents have joined the band, open to all ages, and there are about 125 members, some whole family units. About a third of the members are from Grove and every year the Band plays on the Village Green at the Mayfair. I live in Grove and my mother and sister are both members of the Band. The Band helps the district in processions, fetes, taking part in competitions, giving concerts. They also visit Grove for carol singing. The band is now very popular and The Grove and Wantage people are very proud to be members of it.
